*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas McKinney to Austin, Nacogdoches, June 24, 1830. Asks for information of political affairs. Fears that arrest of Padilla will prove to be a great injury to his section.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-24-1830"> June 24th 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir*/p*
*p*I wrote you by *date_mentioned n="06-23-1830">yesterday*/date_mentioned*s mail though in the greatest haste and having the present oportunity of immediate conveyance I again request that you give me whatever information you may be in possession of as to the business of this *location_mentioned*section */location_mentioned*what will be the result as to buisness already commenced, I am fearful we have lost in *person_mentioned*Padilla */person_mentioned*more than we will easily regain or perhaps more that we will at all who is the *person_mentioned*comisioner */person_mentioned*destined for this place and what do you think of his appointment viz do you think he will suit us.*/p*
*p*From what I have heard of your health I think you-would perhaps not do amiss to come and spend the sickly season with us on the *location_mentioned*Ayish byou*/location_mentioned* we will move in two or three days to that *location_mentioned*section*/location_mentioned* and would be sincerly glad If you could come and remain with us until the season Changes I shall then take a tour through the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and go to the *location_mentioned*Brazos */location_mentioned*I am desirous of seeing *person_mentioned*Mr. Fisher */person_mentioned*and getting some information necessary for commencing the coasting trade in the *date_mentioned n="SPring - 1831">spring */date_mentioned*or sooner If practicable your letters directed to this place will be received without delay should I not be here.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas F. McKinney */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*NB You mentioned somthing when I saw you last of the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned* having said to you somthing of the subject of receiving the appointment of *person_mentioned*Xefe de Partido*/person_mentioned* of this part of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* I hope the plan has not been abandoned I am sure you could render invaluable services to this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*You have some enimies from envious principles but the large majority would be gratified with an arrangement of that kind As soon as I arrived from the *location_mentioned*Brazos*/location_mentioned* I wrote a single letter to each of the *location_mentioned*districts */location_mentioned*recommending to them to petition to you to come on with the *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*and to subscribe to you for doing so subscriptions could not be circulated before news arrived of the *person_mentioned*Comisioner */person_mentioned*leaving*location_mentioned* St Philepe*/location_mentioned* though considerably above a thousand Dollars were subscribed and three times the amt would have been subscribed but on hearing he had left *location_mentioned*St Philipe */location_mentioned*the matter was droped respt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*McKinney */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
